title: Add admin invites, user names in team overview, and invite timestamps

requirements.text: Add the ability to create invite links specifically for the administrator role, allowing admins to share administrative privileges with new users

quotes: poter creare un link di invito anche per un amministratore, cos√¨ da condividere l'opzione amministratore

acceptanceCriteria: InviteManagement component includes a role selector (user/admin) when generating invites
Backend createInviteCode accepts an optional role parameter
Generated invite codes carry role information
Onboarding flow respects the invite's designated role and assigns it to new profiles
Admin invites are visually distinguished in the invite list

requirements.text: Display user names instead of identity codes in the Team Overview (Panoramica team) to meet regulatory compliance requirements for managing team members

quotes: nella Panoramica team gli utenti vengono individuati solo con un codice, invece a noi serve sapere il loro nome per poter gestire gli adempimenti normativi

acceptanceCriteria: TeamOverview component queries and displays user profile names alongside attendance data
User names are shown in attendance records instead of principal/identity codes
CSV export includes user names rather than codes
All team member identifiers are human-readable throughout the overview interface

requirements.text: Show the creation date and time for each generated invite link in the invite management interface

quotes: quando si generano i link di invito fai vedere anche l'orario di creazione e la data

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores timestamp when each invite code is created
InviteManagement component displays formatted creation date and time for each invite
Timestamps are shown in Italian locale format (dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm)
Newly created invites immediately show their creation timestamp in the UI

constraints: Preserve all existing user data including profiles, attendance records, holidays, and permissions
Maintain compatibility with existing invite codes already in use
Do not modify the Internet Identity authentication flow
nonGoals: Changing the overall invite system workflow
Modifying existing user roles or permissions structure beyond adding admin invite capability
Redesigning the Team Overview layout or statistics calculations
Adding new regulatory compliance features beyond displaying user names
